mdRecord.dcterms:title: Where Beulah Lived in Melrose, March 6, 1937
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of a town viewed from a set of railroad tracks with a blue arrow on the right side of the photograph pointing towards a building, with the back of the photograph having a description which reads "Where Beulah Lived in Melrose", March 6, 1937
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
